name: International Music Managers Forum
goal:
The core mission of the IMMF is to keep a watch on the economic and legal interests of artists. Our vision is to create better trading conditions for all artists around the world. Therefore the

IMMF advocates for and promotes the artists’ and managers’ issues to foster awareness of the importance of creativity for both its economic and cultural worth. It is essential to engage with organisations that have such a voice in the shaping of the new content industries. Thereby, IMMF represents a key knowledge base for securing a safer future for free-lance artists.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Development, Education, Enlargement, External Relations, Information Society, Internal Market, Research and Technology, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Youth
euInitiatives: Copyright, Industry, Education, Culture, Data, DSM
